content.prompt: The provisions established by Pinckneyâ€™s Treaty were important to the development of United States commerce because they

choices.label: provided the basis for a profitable fishing enterprise along the Mississippi River
transformed the Mississippi River into an important defensive boundary against Spanish invasions
resolved a long-standing territorial dispute with the French
encouraged the development of trade through the port of New Orleans
gave the United States possession of Florida

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
